metadata.synopsis: If we go up on the roof above Isobel’s room, we’ll find discarded FF armour and some bloodstains from a transformation of some kind. A successful med check shows someone burst out of their armour (Marcus)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Someone - something - shed Flaming Fist armour like a second skin.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Blood and bits of armour. Worrying.
